definition: to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)

sentences.english: You must not worship the LORD your God in their way.
sentences.chinese: 你们不可照他们那样事奉耶和华你们的神。

sentences.english: They worshiped their idols, which became a snare to them.
sentences.chinese: 事奉他们的偶像，这就成了自己的网罗。

sentences.english: Serve the LORD with fear and rejoice with trembling .
sentences.chinese: 当存畏惧事奉耶和华，又当存战兢而快乐。

sentences.english: For twelve years they had been subject to Kedorlaomer, but in the thirteenth year they rebelled.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经事奉基大老玛十二年，到十三年就背叛了。

sentences.english: The boy Samuel ministered before the LORD under Eli.
sentences.chinese: 童子撒母耳在以利面前事奉耶和华。

sentences.english: We believe fervent and unceasing prayer should under-gird all our ministries and personal life.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信火热与恒久的祷告是我们事奉与生活的根基。

sentences.english: Either attitude will take you out of service and rob you of your joy.
sentences.chinese: 两种态度都会令你离开事奉岗位，夺去你的喜乐。

sentences.english: Today God still bestows these abilities and thousands of others, so people can serve him.
sentences.chinese: 今天神仍赐与千万人这些才能，让他们可以事奉他。

sentences.english: Worshipers are called to hear God and to serve him in obedience every day.
sentences.chinese: 敬拜的人每一天都蒙召聆听神的话和顺服事奉祂。

sentences.english: Indeedthe ministry requires one to exercise self-control over one's body.
sentences.chinese: 的确，事奉需要一个人控制自己的身体。

sentences.english: Has God called you to a special task or any type of service for him?
sentences.chinese: 神是否呼召你去作一项特殊的任务或某项事奉呢？

sentences.english: Must clearly sense the calling of God to the ministry.
sentences.chinese: 必须清楚神对他全职事奉的呼召。

sentences.english: Serve the Lord with fear and rejoice with trembling.
sentences.chinese: 要存畏惧心来事奉永恒主，要战兢兢快乐。

sentences.english: Do you recognize the folly of a servant of God attempting to minister without eating of the heavenly manna?
sentences.chinese: 你想一个神的工人能不吃属灵的吗哪，而专一事奉么？

sentences.english: And reciprocally the minister hopes to invoke like affectionsin one's students.
sentences.chinese: 作为回报，事奉的人希望他的学生对他有同样的情感。

sentences.english: Then Elkanah went home to Ramah, but the boy ministered before the LORD under Eli the priest.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子在祭司以利面前事奉耶和华。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
the will of Heaven/the will of God
